PregnancyStatusValueSetMappingsLoincToSnomedCt (http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/ips/ConceptMap/loinc-pregnancy-status-to-snomed-ct-uv-ips)

Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/ips/ValueSet/pregnancy-status-uv-ips to urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.85

DRAFT. Published on 2022-11-22 03:24:39+0000 by Health Level Seven International - Patient Care Work Group (http://www.hl7.org/Special/com...).

Pregnancy Status: LOINC Answers to SNOMED CT concepts. This is an informative map and may be subject to future change.


Group 1Mapping from Logical Observation Identifiers, Names and Codes (LOINC) to SNOMED CT (all versions)

Source CodeRelationshipTarget CodeComment
LA15173-0 (Pregnant)is equivalent to77386006 (Pregnant)
LA26683-5 (Not pregnant)is equivalent to60001007 (Not pregnant)
LA4489-6 (Unknown)narrower102874004 (Possible pregnancy)Possible pregnancy is a subset of all possible unknown pregnancy statuses

title: Pregnancy Status Value Set Mappings - LOINC to SNOMED CT
